title: How has Google made people millionaires? - Quora

response.answer_text: The obvious answer is that Google IPO made people immediately involved in Google rich, or those that held or were paid in shares of Google stock. Moreover, if they were smart not to sell that stock immediately after the IPO, those people now hold a vastly larger amount of money in today's market. Here's a success story concerning the IPO of a different company, but the principles are the same. Other than that advertising produces a huge revenue stream. That's the Google's main money-maker.
